reviews.text: The scandic is a very good hotel, with lovely sauna in the 5th floor.
reviews.title: Good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are nice, spacious and clean with confy beds.
reviews.title: Scandic Ferrum

reviews.text: Fast check in - just gave name and receptionist found reservation straight away, unlike some other hotels, that seem to have problems even with the booking ref, etc lol
reviews.title: Kiruna's Hotel

reviews.text: We had a early flight next day and early breakfast was provided after 5am! Nice one. Actually, we met the Flynordic crew which flight we were going to catch to Stockholm,,at breakfast : )
reviews.title: A great hotel in Kiruna

reviews.text: Again, got to say, that the coffee is horrible in Scandic hotels lol - have tea instead !
reviews.title: Kiruna and dogsledge

likes.liked: — The location 200km above the arctic circle
likes.disliked: — Place to park the rental car
